title: Systems Thinking Support Tool Development Workshop for Public Administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of organizational management and systems thinking, experience in public service sectors
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, emphasizing job applicability for adult learners

learning_goals: Participants can develop three system thinking tool prototypes while applying the tool design process
Participants can complete at least one one-page tool applicable to organizational system analysis (e.g., collaboration/culture development/evaluation)
Participants can explain iterative design approaches for improving system thinking tools based on focus group feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
